article_text:
LONDON—Graham Mackay, chairman of brewing giant SABMiller PLC, has died at the age of 64 after a long illness.

Mr. Mackay was diagnosed with a brain tumor in April and died peacefully Wednesday morning with his family by his side, SAB said in a statement. He had been largely absent from the business since undergoing surgery in May.

SAB...

article_summary:
LONDON—Graham Mackay, chairman of brewing giant SABMiller PLC, has died at the age of 64 after a long illness.
He had been largely absent from the business since undergoing surgery in May.
Mr. Mackay was diagnosed with a brain tumor in April and died peacefully Wednesday morning with his family by his side, SAB said in a statement.
